TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but they send you up without a spacesuit or rocket and you simultaneously asphyxiate and freeze to death.

I wish I cat

I wish wish cat

I wish for cat

I wish a cat.

I wish way cat.

I wish to cat.

I wish keep cat.

I wish an cat.

I wish idiot cat.

I wish in cat.

I wish suspense cat.

Now read every third word.

Granted, but all youre cats die of an illness.

I wish jebediah was real. 8)

Granted, but he straps an SRB to your back and attempts to launch you at the Mun.

I wish for Jeb_Kerman to keep himself in suspense.

Granted, but then he dies of suspence.

I wish i could be on the orion space craft when it comes out =P

Granted, but you\'re in the cargo bay, and they neglected to make sure there was sufficient air circulation down there.

I wish for air.

Granted, put the air is filled with methane/oxygen and I light a flame...

I wish for MOAR BOOSTERS!

Granted, but they are all attached to your brain and activate at random intervals. Enjoy the remainder of your life.

I wish for ' '.

Granted, but they are all attached to your brain and activate at random intervals. Enjoy the remainder of your life.

I wish for ' '.

Granted, but it does nothing.

I wish for more smiles. 8)

Granted, but the next time you see anything other than a smile, you will spontaneously combust.

I wish sss would see this:

Granted, but then a moderator deletes youre post.

I wish for the space shuttle to come back.

Granted, but then a moderator deletes youre post.

I wish for the space shuttle to come back.

Granted, but NASA has to sell the crawlers to build a shuttle, leaving it stranded.

I wish for something.

Granted, but you get given a clothes peg

I wish I was President of he United States of America

Noo, not Bush again If you didn\'t get it because you\'re Bush now, you turned into Bush

I wish for perfect vacuum to leave my teachers brain

Granted, but then the vacuum sucks you up.

I wish for spore 2

Granted, but it sucks more then being forced to watch KSP be bought by a major studio.

I wish for a computer that can run KSP, WITHOUT VIRUSES.

Granted, but it can only barely run it. You have green oceans and lag with 1 capsule, a fuel tank, and an engine.

I wish for there to be a game that combines all of the good aspects of the Total War Series, Skyrim, Spore, the Civilization Series, KSP, and Orbiter in a spectacular manner.

Granted, but it can only barely run it. You have green oceans and lag with 1 capsule, a fuel tank, and an engine.

I wish for there to be a game that combines all of the good aspects of the Total War Series, Skyrim, Spore, the Civilization Series, KSP, and Orbiter in a spectacular manner.

Granted, but it costs so much that when you buy your copy, the entire world economy collapses and world war III starts and destroys the world.

I wish that the world map test is banned from world geography. Honestly 196 countries and capitols. And landforms.

Granted, but you are forced to learn a map of the entire universe instead, including names of every single object within.

I wish I could teleport.

Have fun in geostationary orbit and hopefully you\'ll find some oxygen

I wish for being home at Mirial

Granted, but you are disowned by the Mirialans, in which case you fall into the depths of a hole in a mountain, and die.

I wish for an inexpensive game that combines all of the good aspects of the Total War Series, Skyrim, Spore, the Civilization Series, KSP, and Orbiter in a spectacular manner.

Granted, but the sheer amount of awesome instantly blows up every computer ever invented in the history of the world ever.

I wish that my laptop did not use PowerPC and instead used an alternative that could run KSP.

Granted, but you spill coffee on it the second you start it up, forcing you to buy a PowerPC again.

I wish for pie. Good pie.

Granted, but a clown throws it at your face.

I wish I had a ticket to ride on SpaceShipTwo.

Granted, but the ship blows up on liftoff

I wish for a bike.

Granted, but it is so rusty that it collapses upon a feather touching it.

I wish for MOAR BOOOOOOOSTERS!
